list-item.p: Number of Citations—the total number of citations for a specific infectious disease.
Number of Papers—the total number of published papers for a specific infectious disease.

Normalized Paper Rate (NPR)—the ratio between the Number of Papers published on a specific infectious disease d and the total number of papers in the fields of medicine or biology in the year y.
